channel.title: 1samuel on dfangx's website
channel.description: Recent content in 1samuel on dfangx's website

item.title: Day 102, 1 Samuel 15-17
item.description: God gives Saul the command to completely destroy the Amalekites for how they treated Israel when Israel came out of Egypt.

item.title: Day 101, 1 Samuel 13-14
item.description: Saul goes to war against the Philistines. However, increasing defections begin to make Saul very nervous. As a result, instead of waiting for Samuel to come, he offers the sacrifice unlawfully.

item.title: Day 100, 1 Samuel 9-12
item.description: Saul is introduced as a Benjaminite searching for the missing donkeys of his father. Unable to find them, he turns to the seer, who is Samuel.

item.title: Day 99, 1 Samuel 4-8
item.description: Israel went to war against the Philistines and were defeated in battle. In response, Israel brought the the ark of the covenant into their camp.

item.title: Day 98, 1 Samuel 1-3
item.description: The birth of Samuel gives a glimpse into the hearts of the people of Israel and the priesthood of God. Hannah was barren, yet persistently prayed to God for a child.
